sentences.sContent: Most seasonal hiring is done in early October.
sentences.sCn: 多数季节性招聘是在10月初进行。

sentences.sContent: ...The second trip was made in October last year...
...began to wake up about a half-hour later each day after President Vladimir Putin shifted the country permanently to "winter time" starting on October 26...
...The value of listed shares in American firms collapsed by 57% from its peak in October 2007 to a low in March this year...

trans.tranOther: the tenth month of the year, between September and November
